perturbation.original_text: B. Payment Terms. Wade Product Royalties described above in Section 8A will be paid on a quarterly basis on the first day of each of the months of July, October, January, and April and shall be accompanied by backup documentation reasonably satisfactory to Wade.
perturbation.changed_text: B. Payment Terms. Wade Product Royalties described above in Section 8A will be paid on a quarterly basis on the last day of each of the months of July, October, January, and April and shall be accompanied by backup documentation reasonably satisfactory to Wade.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'first day' to 'last day' creates a direct conflict with the quarterly payment schedule. This introduces ambiguity as to when exactly the payments are due, potentially leading to disputes over late payments.

perturbation.original_text:
12. Termination.
A. Naked shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to Wade in the event Wade fails to perform the Wade Services or breaches any other covenant or agreement set forth herein (including the essence of this Agreement), and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. Such termination shall relieve Naked of its obligation to provide any further consideration pursuant to this Agreement provided that Wade shall retain all warrants he has received hereunder that have vested as of the date of such termination.
perturbation.changed_text:
12. Termination.
A. Naked shall have the right to terminate this Agreement immediately without any prior written notice to Wade in the event Wade fails to perform the Wade Services or breaches any other covenant or agreement set forth herein (including the essence of this Agreement), and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. perturbation.explanation: Changing the notice period from 'ten (10) days prior written notice' to 'immediately without any prior written notice' creates a conflict regarding the notification period, meaning wade may not receive notice.
